string-array.name: facts
string-array.item: "I know I'm talented, but I wasn't put here to sing. I was put here to be a wife and a mom and look after my family. I love what I do, but it's not where it begins and ends."
"We're not planning a honeymoon. Every day is a honeymoon – I've married the best man in the world."
"I’m not a fighter, but if I am backed up against the wall I’ll kick the shit out of anyone."
"I don’t think your ability to fight has anything to do with how big you are. It’s to do with how much anger is in you."
"I'm of the school of thought where, if you can't sort something out for yourself, no one can help you. Rehab is great for some people but not others."

"My justification is that most people my age spend a lot of time thinking about what they’re going to do for the next five or ten years. The time they spend thinking about their life, I just spend drinking."
"I’m either a really good drunk or I’m an out-and-out sh*t, horrible, violent, abusive, emotional drunk."
"(on the pain of getting her 13 tattoos) It's a way of suffering for the things that mean a lot to you."
"It's a funny thing, a morbid curiosity. I'm talking about when I was nine. What does that feel like? 'Ow, that f***ing hurts.' It's probably the worst thing I've done."
"Girls talk to each other like men talk to each other. But girls have an eye for detail."
"After Frank I didn’t write for 18 months but when I met Mark (Ronson) I pretty much wrote the album in six months — he was so inspiring."
"My first kiss was about 11 or 12 and it was with a Greek boy called Chris. .... who's gay now!"
"I like pin-up girls. I’m more of a boy than a girl. I’m not a lesbian, though — not before a sambuca anyway."
"(About her health) A little bit of anorexia, a little bit of bulimia. I'm not totally okay now but I don't think any woman is."
"I have a really good time some nights, but then I push it over the edge and ruin my boyfriend’s night. I’m an ugly dickhead drunk, I really am."
"I don't listen to anyone except my ... inner child anyway. If someone had said to me, Amy, lose a stone - which they wouldn't - I don't think I would have listened anyway."
"I can’t even listen to Frank any more... In fact, I’ve never been able to. I like playing the tracks live because that’s different but listening to them is another story."
"(about cocktail Rickstasy) By the time you’ve had two of them you’re like, don’t even try and go anywhere. Sit down and stay down, until the birds start singing."
"We only said goodbye with words, I died a hundred times. You go back to her and I go back to... I go back to us."
"We're not planning a honeymoon. Every day is a honeymoon - I've married the best man in the world."
"I'm not a fighter, but if I am backed up against the wall I'll kick the shit out of anyone."
"Girls talk to each other like men talk to each other. But girls have an eye for detail."
"I don't think your ability to fight has anything to do with how big you are. It's to do with how much anger is in you."
"I like pin-up girls. I'm more of a boy than a girl. I'm not a lesbian, though - not before a sambuca anyway."
"I'm either a really good drunk or I'm an out and out shit, horrible, violent, abusive, emotional drunk."
"After Frank I didn't write for 18 months but when I met Mark (Ronson) I pretty much wrote the album in six months - he was so inspiring."
"I have a really good time some nights, but then I push it over the edge and ruin my boyfriend's night. I'm an ugly dickhead drunk, I really am."
"They tried to make me go to rehab I said no no no."
"You went back to what you knew, so far removed from all that we went through. And I tread a troubled track, my odds are stacked. I'll go back to black."
"I'm of the school of thought where, if you can't sort something out for yourself, no one can help you. Rehab is great for some people but not others."
"I can't even listen to Frank any more... In fact, I've never been able to. I like playing the tracks live because that's different but listening to them is another story."
"I don't ever wanna drink again. I just, ooh, I just need a friend."
"I love you much, it's not enough. You love blow and I love puff, and life is like a pipe ."
"For you I was a flame, love is a losing game. Five story fire as you came, love is a losing game."
"If I go to the gym and I have a drink, I'm lovely to be around and really sweet."
"Played out by the band, love is a losing hand. More than I could stand, love is a losing hand."
"Drinking long-term is a lot worse than doing heroin. Alcohol's a real poison."
"Self professed, profound till the chips were down. Know you're a gambling man, love is a losing hand."
"I cheated myself, like I knew I would. I told you I was trouble. You know that I'm no good."
"When will we get the time to be just friends. It's never safe for us not even in the evening 'cos I've been drinking."
"There are certain instances where I'll be out and I'll be drunk, and I'll come to work and I'll be shattered."
"I don’t listen to anyone except my . . . inner child anyway."
"I just dress like… I’m an old black man. Sorry! Like I’m an old Jewish black man. I just dress like it’s still the ’50s."
"People don’t change their behavior unless it makes a difference for them to do so."
"I’m of the school of thought where, if you can’t sort something out for yourself, no one can help you. Rehab is great for some people but not others."
"Since I was 16, I’ve felt a black cloud hangs over me. Since then, I have taken pills for depression. "

"Having listened to great songwriters like James Taylor and Carole King, I felt there was nothing new that was coming out that really represented me and the way I felt. So I started writing my own stuff."
"If you act like you know what you’re doing, you can do anything you want."
"If I died tomorrow, I would be a happy girl."
"I wouldn't want it to be all roses because life isn't like that. "
"About Christina Aguilera: She’s a talented girl — but you couldn’t really see it until she was wearing those chaps with her ninny hanging out."
"A little bit of anorexia, a little bit of bulimia. I'm not totally OK now but I don't think any woman is."
"Even if I stop wanting you a perspective pushes through and I'll be some next man's other woman soon."
"For you I was a flame, love is a losing game."
"Why can't he see? How blind can he be? Someday he'll see that he was meant for me."
"I'll be good to him, I'll bring joy to him."
"Just to see that smile, makes my life worthwhile."
"To know know know him is to love love love him."
"I was on my way to Banbury Cross, then I see a monkey upon a white horse."
"Now I know that, now I understand."
"I never saw you, I only heard of you."
"Now cupid if your arrow makes his love strong for me, I swear I'm gonna love him until eternity."
"Hey cupid cupid I'm calling.. Don't you hear me I'm calling you?"
"Listen, I don't want to bother you but I'm in distress. there's danger of me loosing all of my happiness."
"Cupid please hear my cry and let your arrow fly straight to my lover's heart for me."
"Cupid draw back your bow and let your arrow flow."
"I think of all the things, what you're doing and in my head I paint a picture."
"I hope you didn't catch a tan, I hope you find the right man who'll fix it for you."
"Stop making a fool out of me, Why don't you come on over?"
"Don't make no difference if I end up alone, I'd rather have myself a smoke my homegrown."
"I'm my own man so when will you learn that you got a man but I got to burn."
"Tell your boyfriend next time he around to buy his own weed and don't wear my shit down."
"The miss misses the man that he belongs to be."
"Though he tries to pacify her, whats inside her never dies."
"How can he have her heart when it got stole?"
"She's so vacant her soul is taken, he is what she's running from."
"He can only hold her for so long."
"He still stands in spite of what his scars say.. I'll battle till this bitter finale just me, my dignity and this guitar case."
"It's you I'm fighting for, he can't lose with me in tow . I refuse to let him go."
"I stand before him, It's all I can do to assure him."
"This ache in my chest as my day is done now, the dark covers me and I cannot run now."
"If I was my heart I'd rather be restless."
"Moon spilling in and I wake up alone.."
"This face in my dreams seizes my guts, he floods me with dread."
"That silent sense of content that everyone gets just disappears soon as the sun sets."
"Got so sick of crying so just lately, when I catch myself I do a 180."
"It's okay in the day I'm staying busy.. Tied up enough so I don't have to wonder where is he."
"I wish I could say no regrets and no emotional debts."
"So we are history, your shadow covers me."
"I shouldn't play myself again, I should just be my own best friend."
"I don't understand why do I stress a man."
"And in this grey, in this blue shade my tears dry on their own."
"He walks away, the sun goes down."
"I don't know why I got so attached, It's my responsibility and you don't owe nothing to me but to walk away I have no capacity."
"All I can ever be to you is a darkness that we knew and this regret I had to get accustomed to."
"Memories mar my mind, love is a fate resigned."
"Love is a losing hand more than I could stand."
"I wish I never played.. oh what a mess we made."
"You go back to her and I go back to black."
"I love you much It's not enough.."
"You go back to her and I go back to us."
"We only said goodbye with words, I died a hundred times."
"My odds are stacked I'll go back to black."
"You went back to what you knew, so far removed from all that we went through."
"He left no time to regret, kept his dick wet with his same old safe bet."
"I wanna touch you but that just hurts.."
"I'll never love you like her.. Though we need to find the time to just do this shit together.."
"And no I'm not ashamed but the guilt will kill you, if she don't first."
"It's always dangerous when everybody's sleeping and I've been thinking: can we be alone?"
"When will we get the time to be just friends?"
"But I could swear that we were through.. I still want to wonder about the things you do."
"What kind of fuckery are we? Nowadays you don't mean dick to me."
"You can't keep lying to yourself like this.. Can't believe you played yourself like this."
"No you ain't worth guest list plus one of all them girls you kiss."
"You thought I didn't love you when I did, can't believe you played me out like that."
"You say \"what did you do with him today?\" and sniffed me out like I was Tanqueray."
"You shrug and it's the worst, who truly stuck the knife in first."
"\"There'll be none of him no more\". I cried for you on the kitchen floor."
"Upstairs in bed with my ex boy, he's in a place but I can't get joy."
"I cheated myself like I knew I would.. I told you I was trouble you know that I'm no good."
"It's not just my pride. It's just 'til these tears have dried."
"I don't ever wanna drink again, I just ooh I just need a friend."
"I'm gonna, I'm gonna lose my baby.. so I always keep a bottle near."
"There's nothing you can teach me that I can't learn from Mr Hathaway."
"Yes I've been black but when I come back you'll know know know."
